unnormalised: Auto-rickshaws in Chennai are the best for short distances! Just be ready to bargain, they'll quote ₹150 for a 3km ride, but you can usually get it down to Rs. 80. Did a road trip last month, Mumbai to Pune, NH48 is mostly good but expect some tolls, like ₹250 at Khalapur toll plaza. Remember to carry your DL!
normalised: Auto-rickshaws in Chennai are the best for short distances! Just be ready to bargain, they'll quote rupee one hundred and fifty for a three kilometer ride, but you can usually get it down to rupees eighty. Did a road trip last month, Mumbai to Pune, N-H-fourty eight is mostly good but expect some tolls, like rupee two hundred and fifty at Khalapur toll plaza. Remember to carry your D-L!
